intro.description: Add a RPM by using content assist.

item.title: Edit the RPM's name name
item.description: The name of the RPM should be the fully qualified name used by the Linux RPM system.

subitem.label: Modify the "rpmName" to reflect the name of the RPM.

item.title: Edit the RPM's version
item.description: The RPM's version should reflect the wanted version of the RPM from the RPM system.

subitem.label: Modify the rpm version specification after the 'rpm:' version type prefix.

item.title: Edit the RPM's locationation
item.description: The source location of the RPM unit should be a URI (URL) where the RPM definition can be obtained.

subitem.label: Modify the 'rpmURI' to reflect where the RPM can be fetched.
Press TAB to finish the templates.
